markdown:
<title level="1" right="Creature Family">[Hell Hound](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=427)</title>

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 194 <sup>1.1</sup>

Hell hounds are fiendish, extraplanar canines hailing from the Pit that can hunt down quarry and breathe supernatural gouts of flame. They are temperamental and quick to exhibit aggressive behavior.

<title level="2">Members</title>
[Greater Hell Hound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3048) (Creature 9), [Hell Hound](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3047) (Creature 3)
name: Hell Hound
